description: Angular pipe that formats numbers as currency strings using the Intl API. It implements the PipeTransform interface to provide a 'currencyFormat' pipe, which converts numeric or string inputs into localized currency strings with configurable currency code, locale, and fraction digits.

classes.name: CurrencyFormatPipe
classes.description: An Angular standalone pipe that formats numbers as currency strings using Intl.NumberFormat with given locale and currency code.

methods.name: transform(value: number | string | null | undefined, currency = 'INR', locale = 'en-IN', minim/ transform
methods.description: Converts a number or string into a localized currency string using Intl.NumberFormat with specified locale, currency, and minimum fraction digits. Handles null, undefined, empty string, and NaN inputs gracefully.
